long_description: Save your breath. The Advanced Elements 12 Volt electric pump conveniently plugs into your motor vehicle's cigarette lighter or accessory socket. 3 different-sized nozzles fit just about any air mattress or inflatable boat. Works for both inflation and deflation. 12-volt DC power required.
short_description: Save your breath. The Advanced Elements 12 Volt electric pump conveniently plugs into your motor vehicle's cigarette lighter or accessory socket.
